title: Manchester United's leadership problem: Faith in youth only works if senior leaders are present to show the way
text:
It is when you canvass the names of the senior players at Manchester United - those in that 26 plus age bracket - that the inadequacies and failings of a team going backwards start to add up. United’s problems run right to the very top and, until the owners sell and/or a first rate football executive is put in place to rethink the whole operation, little will change and days like Sunday’s shambles at St James’ Park will become increasingly common.

Yet nothing embodies the botched thinking quite like the parade of listless senior professionals who have been allowed to stay too long, or who should never have been there, or who no longer want to be there.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s desire to promote...
description: It is when you canvass the names of the senior players at Manchester United - those in that 26 plus age bracket - that the inadequacies and failings of a team going backwards start to add up.
